> <OLD - Windlord/Perceptor>
>
> Windlord and Percetor walked towards the Command room and Windlord said
> "What's the situation?"

LORD ELDER sat alone on a darkened bridge, the only lights were from
the instruments that were positioned around the room, and the giant
view screen that say towards the front.

The view on the screen was of two scenes. On one side was a picture of
of the large jungle that TUSCON and the rest had went to on one side
of it. On the other was a view of the antarctic with a tower sitting
majestically on a tranquil frozen lake.

"The situation is . . . " LORD ELDER paused for a moment as he
continued to look at the scene before him. "The situation is I don't
know. We have now lost contact with Polar Claw as well as Tuscon." His
tone was sad and yet resolute.

(TAG)

- Preston
